review: The doctor is very welcoming friendly n thorough in her work. She understands that every patient is different and treats them accordingly with utmost care.The assistant was co-operative n friendly as well. Initially I had to wait for quite a long time to see the doc but then when I discussed the inconvenience of waiting , she adjusted the time accordingly. I highly appreciate her this gesture. Overall I would anytime recommend Dr. Neelam for all dental issues.

review: Dr Neelam is simple , down to earth,  experienced and fantastic dental surgeon I have met. I was zo scary with my dental issue before I met her, but she not only explain the root cause of the issue but treat it so professionally that it seems I don't have any dental issue any more,
